#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
#define getcx getchar_unlocked
inline void inp(int &n)
{
    n=0;
	int ch=getcx();
	int sign=1;
    while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' )
	{
		if(ch=='-')
		sign=-1;
		ch=getcx();
	}
	while(  ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
    n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getcx();
    n=n*sign;
}
int main()
{
    double x;
    int t;
    inp(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int y;
        inp(y);
        y=(int)sqrt(y);
        printf("%d\n",y);
    }
    return 0;
}
